name: The Adventures Of Scrawny
description:
The Adventures Of Scrawny

ZenoJam5 - Light Attracts Bugs

Help Scrawny reach the goal using the lights to guide him and avoid the bad Biff bugs.

Click on the buttons to switch them on and off.

More puzzles planned with cool contraptions but we ran out of time.

Thanks for playing!

Programming - JFlex

Art/Animation - CountingWithTeeth

Music Used -

Garage - Monplaisir

Skipping in the No Standing Zone - Peter Gresser

Shopping List - Komiku
